Registered home for people with mental health problems. Referrals from professional agencies only. Clients have to be funded by a local authority and therefore require a full needs assessment. Offer shared accommodation in 4 bungalows.
In addition offers support to people who receive an Individual Budget for their mental health needs. Can provide advice and information on Direct Payments and help with care planning. Can provide support with day-to-day budgeting, shopping, attending appointments and taking part in activities or interests. Costs are Â£18.87 per hour.
